title: https://code.quarkus.io/ uses gradle version unsupported by Kotlin
body:
### Describe the bug

When I use https://code.quarkus.io/ and generate project with Gradle+Kotlin dependecy I get project with Gradle 8.8 and 1.9.23

According to docs Kotlin 1.9.23 support fully 8.1.1
https://kotlinlang.org/docs/gradle-configure-project.html#apply-the-plugin 

I am not sure of that is real issue or what features of Gradle are not compatible 


### Expected behavior

Quarkus project Kotlin with 1.9.23 should use Gradle 8.1.1
Quarkus project Kotlin with 2.0.0 should use Gradle 8.5

### Actual behavior

Quarkus project Kotlin with 1.9.23 use Gradle 8.8
